title: Butter Chicken
description: A rich and creamy Indian curry made with tender chicken simmered in a spiced tomato and butter sauce.
instructions: Combine yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, and salt in a bowl.
Add chicken pieces to the mixture and coat evenly. Cover and marinate for at least 1 hour to absorb flavors.
Heat 2 tablespoons of butter in a pan and cook the marinated chicken until lightly browned on all sides. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add the remaining butter and pour in the tomato puree. Let it cook for 10 minutes until slightly thickened.
Add the chicken back into the sauce and simmer on low heat for 15 minutes so the flavors blend well.
Pour in the heavy cream and stir until the sauce becomes rich and creamy. Cook for another 5 minutes.
Taste and adjust salt or spices if needed before serving.
